documents.document: @MeganWegan Well @shadoesuzanna has a copy of the “Kate Shepard sent me“ sign on her Facebook if that’s what you mean?

@meganjwhelan have a great party lovely and Happy New Year 😘
Hey @vodafoneNZ - I heard you were crediting people that have been using mobile data instead of cable internet in wellington. Is this true?
Successful Christmas brunch. Saw family, ate yummy food, avoided presents (mostly), now quiet time until friend pot luck later. Best.
@fibbyccino @eey0re the attitude of covering your costs? Not sure family business would last long if they were losing every day....
@fibbyccino @eey0re it would be smarter to only offer prebooking so you know you can cover that
@fibbyccino @eey0re I can’t imagine many places will be open for drop in, considering they have to pay staff 1.5x plus lieu.
@johubris was lovely to see you last night hon. Also people who don’t eat are WEIRD.
@MeganWegan probably mad at the world for being up so early on holiday. Hope you have a good one! x
Why is Mark Zuckerberg eating dry toast? Where’s the butter and jam?!
@Lulacorn @georgemary_ well isn’t the tahini what makes it hummus? Maybe try guacamole or salsa instead?
@allchiara but lawmaking is still senate right? Just seems a bit of a mental disconnect - keen for change, elect the same except 1 person.
@allchiara Why do voters continually try to change governors/presidents but not the actual senate? Surely changing both would work better
@Lulacorn also they probably won't guess. I complained re downstairs neighbours at old place at least once a wk & they were always friendly
@Lulacorn I alway suggest a)talking to them, then b)talking to landlord & noise control and then c)moving. It's not worth your mental health
@Lulacorn ok. & do what? Make more noise? Lack of sleep is a kind of torture, and one of the main reasons I've stayed or left a place.
@Lulacorn na, the complaints don't say where they come from. Could be next door too. Do it. Also, complain to your landlord!
@Lulacorn @_curly_ju @StephanieMarija @georgemary_ @WellingtonChic maybe at Te Whaea?
@_curly_ju @Lulacorn @StephanieMarija @georgemary_ @WellingtonChic they are, but only 3.30-6pm
@MeganWegan so exciting! Congrats x
This is a brilliant on the skills found in places you didn't know to look when you write off the topic. https://t.co/RxQPl1lz6b
@timclicks @emilynz yeah, what he said, except for the fact that rain is forecast all day, so a raincoat might be a good bet.
Tracking number says still with courier, but I got a weird tracking email saying “delivered countdown”. Which Countdown? Why? @nzpost /end
THEN @nzpost Promised delivery on Tuesday to correct address. Is it here? No. Apparently “with courier” since Monday. 2/3 ..
Ordered a package on 18 Nov overnight delivery. @nzpost kept it until we rang on 3rd Dec cos they decided address was wrong (it wasn’t). 1/2
@MsAnna_Jane lol. I'm not going anywhere but I doubt I'll be up for lunches in early Jan. Maybe by mid Jan? Otherwise try for next 2 weeks!
@MsAnna_Jane ah yep I know that one. That's the only problem with working remotely, VPN issues
@MsAnna_Jane I support this brownie need. But also have a table available at mine if you need a change of scene #workfromhome
Love Emily’s (@suitey) presenting style and energy. So relaxed yet enthusiastic. Great end to #MahukiNZ showcase https://t.co/rrQTosimdn
Chris from @PointZeroIT captivating the audience at the @Mahuki_TePapa showcase. Love watching this guy grow every year & stay impressive
@Lulacorn Christmas Cardno?

@sneakybaker @meganjwhelan she’s the best
@where_is_anna you just need to cultivate more friends in their 70s
@where_is_anna for sure! I'm around for a bit longer with a wee bit more free time at the moment.
@where_is_anna but late, but happy birthday from me too young lady!! 🎉🍰🍭🍦🎁🍻🧀
@badtom @wellingtonista then again, Stephen Franks stood down when @grantrobertson1 won. I’d say it’s a reflection on Grant’s popularity.

@br3nda surely potatoes store well? Pull them out of the ground and stick them in a dark, cool place.
@wellykowhai what @alexsaru said. Also, the WCC facebook and WREMO facebook are pretty good for updates I’ve found.
Errr, so my books were due back @wcl_library on Sunday. And yes, I was sick then/slack before. But now it’s still closed but I owe them $20?
In 3 months they made $600k from kiwi businesses paying fake invoices. This is why old school paper scams still work https://t.co/SXPrW6yVty
@MeganWegan I was gonna stop commuting at the end of the month anyway, just means I surrender my coffee cup to the earthquake gods
So I am now likely working from home for the rest of year. Anyone want to do Newtown coffee catch-up one morning? @MeganWegan @wellykowhai
@toxaq generally stay within walking or biking distance of home/ work. Well that’s what I do anyway.
@MeganWegan I just spent the last 10mins catching up through @radionz website. You’re a goddess and I love your work. Thanks so much xx
@uniquelikethem I assume it’s a result of Te Reo being a spoken language, with no fixed written version until (mostly) recently
@uniquelikethem this page uses both and has an explanation why https://t.co/SiIUL5QT8I
@uniquelikethem yes. You’re right. Which website?
@thedemlz it's tweets like this offer that make me wish I had a car
Hey @vodafoneNZ - how long on a fix for Wgtn Cable? It’s been bad since at least mid afternoon yesterday!
@KiwibankNZ address could be problem - joint account updated ok for partner but not 4me. Will wait for a reply to the bank mail sent last wk
Thanks for the help fixing this @ANZ_NZ! https://t.co/dfKq4sIXNx
.@emilynz Although still better than @KiwibankNZ who never sent me a new eftpos card and mine expired last month :(
Turns out @ANZ_NZ has been charging me for 3 years for a visa debit card I never knew about, received, or used. Check yr accounts ppl!
@uniquelikethem it means looking forward to seeing you tonight! Might have some red lippie somewhere…
@meganjwhelan I thought it was a brownie/ girl guides standard. Surely everyone knows it
@radionz you fixed in record time, so no worries!
@MeganWegan oh mate. That's terrible. Sending you lots of love and hugs x
@staceyvivienne @where_is_anna I second this recommendation
@thedemlz oh crap. That's terrible
@thedemlz say what? Who lets them have cell phones?
Someone on the @WgtnCC FB page moans that having fireworks on 5Nov is not "well thought out" cos it clashes w/ sport. 500yrs too late dude
@johubris @goultr yeah and the massage after was awesome.
@johubris @goultr I ended up just opening the lid and listening to the traffic. Thorndon was definitely stuffy and horrid. I couldn't cope.
@johubris @goultr I overheated and felt like I was going to faint. Liked the floating, didn't like the sauna aspect (went to Thorndon one)
@MeganWegan delightful. What about what the woman feels? Why do they let such poor science on the radio?
Good to see you too! I'm looking forward to seeing all the companies grow over the last 6 weeks! https://t.co/MDzg2KXbJg
@sneakybaker lol this was also my thoughts! No skin and lentils? Was yum tho. @MyFoodBagNZ
Ok recovery plan: another cuppa, emails for a couple of hours, then wander to the zoo for bees, lunch and some quality giraffe watching time
Today update: home, alive, tired, sore, scared of my email inbox.
Been in Auckland almost a day now and mostly it's just wet. Where does all this water come from? Will it ever end?

@meganjwhelan so. I do either option, depending on what I feel like.
@thedemlz yay for contract. Best of luck with the mental effort/ exhaustion part 💛
Left the office for a two week break. Looking forward to @Discovery4teens!
@GraemeEdgeler @adzebill Would LOVE to see breakdown by decile of where it's actually offered. Access to teachers a problem?
@GraemeEdgeler @adzebill (as pakeha) trying to continue from primary in the 90s, we found few schools offered it unless via correspondence.
@GraemeEdgeler @adzebill I'd be interested to see how many decile 1 high schools actually offer it. Lack of teachers in this area... 1/2
@gtiso unfortunately, there's two councillors elected for Southern Ward, and the choice is only out of 5, a couple nuts, ALL male
@gtiso he’s all, ask the community, when actually HE’S the one jumping in the paper inflaming the anticycleway peeps every 2mins
@thedemlz when it comes to ANY part of parenting, you should do what works for you. Ignore any busybodies telling you otherwise x
@johubris for that night we should have done the equally dramatic walk out. The food was terrible, the company was worse
@johubris lol I doubt it would have helped THAT situation.
@thedemlz the evolution of language use is a fascinating thing. If I was your sister I’d just substitute in the word “mess”.
@thedemlz ahh the old use of ‘slut’ - to mean someone messy, dirty, bad at keeping their house clean. How old is the book?
@CamilleNette they have been known to have exploding batteries. Millions being recalled.

@kahhoe hey - lunch date sometime? Has been forever!

@_vitamink yeah I think screen use kills the battery faster than music playing. As long as you’re not changing songs every 3 mins, it’s ok
@_vitaminK I am testing my iPhone 6S, as I’m now curious. It has been playing music/ radio since 8am (w some games/ reading). Down to 76%
@_vitaminK if you're going off something that old, you may be amazed at battery. But, go with what works for you.
